titles.title: Prisoner Transfer Act of 1999
To amend title 18, United States Code, to transport maximum security prisoners across State lines to prisons that are not classified to handle maximum security prisoners.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 6/8/1999--Introduced. Prisoner Transfer Act of 1999 - Amends the Federal criminal code to prohibit knowingly transporting an individual who is a maximum security prisoner across a State line other than to a prison or other facility classified as a maximum security prison or facility.
